thread.title: Anirudh to go mass for Vedalam
thread.title_full: Anirudh to go mass for Vedalam - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Anirudh to go mass for Vedalam
text:
Anirudh, who is composing the music for Thala Ajith's upcoming film Vedalam says that the album will be mass. The musician posted on his micro-blogging page, "After going romantic and musical with the album of #NaanumRowdyDhaan.. Time to go massy and dance with the album of #Vedalam ! Can't wait :)." In the meantime, the film's music label also posted on its page, "3 days to go!Are you already dreaming of how theri the songs of #ThalaAjith's #Vedalam by @anirudhofficial will be?"
The tracklist includes- Vetri Vinayagam, Geththa Udatha, Anbae Po, En Aaruyire and Vedhalam theme. The audio launch will be held on October 16.
